decks.notes: The main concept of this deck is to maintain a steady stream of pressure on the opponent through aggressive creatures and sacrifice synergies. By utilizing cards like Witch's Oven, Claim the Firstborn, and Priest of Forgotten Gods, this deck can disrupt the opponent's strategy while also generating value for your own game plan. With the added bonus of Lurrus of the Dream-Den as a Companion, providing additional resilience and value, this deck aims to overwhelm the opponent quickly and efficiently.

The main focus of this deck is to control the board through removal spells and targeted discard, while generating value through sacrificing creatures and recurring them. The deck utilizes cards like Cauldron Familiar and Witch's Oven to generate food tokens and trigger abilities like Mayhem Devil and Korvold, Fae-Cursed King. The goal is to outvalue the opponent by constantly recurring threats and gaining card advantage through cards like Midnight Reaper and Trail of Crumbs. The mana base is designed to support the deck's color requirements and ensure consistency in casting its spells.

This Rakdos Aggro deck focuses on fast and aggressive gameplay, using low-cost creatures like Cauldron Familiar and Gutterbones to quickly control the board. Mayhem Devil and Woe Strider provide additional value and damage, while Claim the Firstborn and Witch's Oven can disrupt your opponent's strategy. Castle Locthwain helps with card draw, and Heraldic Banner boosts the power of your creatures. With Obosh, the Preypiercer as a companion, this deck aims to overwhelm your opponent quickly and efficiently, utilizing the synergy between its creatures and spells to secure victory.

The deck focuses on utilizing Winota's ability to cheat powerful creatures onto the battlefield by attacking with non-Human creatures. By including a mix of token generators, cheap creatures, and value engines like Chandra and Lukka, the deck aims to overwhelm opponents with high-impact creatures like Agent of Treachery and Legion Warboss. The mana base provides consistency and flexibility, while the inclusion of cards like Charming Prince and Elite Guardmage help to stabilize against aggressive opponents. Overall, the deck aims to pressure opponents early and efficiently close out games before they can stabilize.

The deck focuses on utilizing powerful control cards like Teferi, Time Raveler and Elspeth Conquers Death to disrupt the opponent's strategy while generating card advantage with cards like Omen of the Sea and Tamiyo, Collector of Tales. It also aims to ramp up its mana quickly with cards like Growth Spiral and Uro, Titan of Nature's Wrath to cast big threats like Shark Typhoon and Archon of Sun's Grace. The deck includes Yorion, Sky Nomad as a companion for additional value and it emphasizes on controlling the board and out-valuing the opponent in the late game.

The main focus of this deck is to control the board and outvalue the opponent using powerful control spells and card advantage engines. The deck aims to consistently hit its land drops and ramp up its mana to cast big threats like Dream Trawler and Uro, Titan of Nature's Wrath. By utilizing cards like Teferi, Time Raveler and Narset, Parter of Veils to disrupt the opponent's game plan, the deck can stabilize the board with board wipes like Shatter the Sky and finish the game with powerful finishers like Dream Trawler and Agent of Treachery.

The main focus of this deck is to aggressively deal damage to the opponent using cheap and efficient red creatures and burn spells. Cards like Cavalcade of Calamity and Torbran, Thane of Red Fell amplify the damage output, while Fling and Heartfire provide additional reach to finish off the opponent. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent quickly by utilizing the synergy between creatures with low mana cost and creature buffs, along with direct damage spells to close out the game before the opponent can stabilize.

The deck focuses on control through counterspells, removal, board wipes, and powerful finishers like Dream Trawler and Sephara, Sky's Blade. It utilizes Teferi, Time Raveler to slow down the opponent and protect key pieces, while also having access to card draw and scrying effects to ensure consistency. The deck aims to control the game by managing threats and eventually overwhelming the opponent with its powerful flying creatures. It also includes some utility lands and a mix of instant-speed interaction to adapt to different matchups and strategies.

The deck focuses on utilizing powerful control cards such as Teferi, Time Raveler and Elspeth Conquers Death to maintain board control and disrupt the opponent's strategy. It also includes cards like Omen of the Sea and Tamiyo, Collector of Tales for card advantage and selection. The deck aims to ramp up mana with Growth Spiral and Uro, Titan of Nature's Wrath to play bigger threats like Archon of Sun's Grace and Agent of Treachery. Yorion, Sky Nomad serves as a companion to provide additional value and synergy with the deck's flicker effects.

The deck focuses on utilizing control elements to manipulate the board and disrupt the opponent's strategy. With cards like Teferi, Time Raveler and Narset, Parter of Veils to control the opponent's hand and spells, along with powerful removal spells like Shatter the Sky and Elspeth Conquers Death. The deck also aims to generate card advantage and value through cards like Tamiyo, Collector of Tales and Yorion, Sky Nomad. The mana base is set up to support a variety of powerful spells and threats, such as Uro, Titan of Nature's Wrath and Shark Typhoon, to eventually overwhelm the opponent and secure victory.

The deck focuses on utilizing Fires of Invention to cast spells for free, allowing the player to control the board and dominate their opponent. It includes a variety of powerful creatures like Questing Beast and Quartzwood Crasher to apply pressure, while also including removal spells like Scorching Dragonfire and Fire Prophecy. The addition of Kaheera, the Orphanguard as a companion provides additional value for the deck. The deck aims to control the game early on and overwhelm the opponent with powerful creatures and spells.

This deck focuses on quickly overwhelming your opponent with aggressive creatures and powerful combat tricks. By utilizing cards that provide quick damage output and ways to protect your creatures, you aim to maintain pressure on your opponent and secure victory before they can stabilize. The combination of efficient creatures and versatile spells allows you to adapt to various situations and keep your opponent on the back foot. With a mix of creatures with trample, haste, and strong combat abilities, you aim to end the game swiftly and decisively.

This deck focuses on aggressively sacrificing creatures to trigger powerful effects and disrupt opponents' strategies. By utilizing cards like Witch's Oven, Cauldron Familiar, and Call of the Death-Dweller, the deck can generate value and pressure opponents early on. Additionally, the inclusion of cards like Fervent Champion, Dreadhorde Butcher, and Kroxa, Titan of Death's Hunger allows the deck to apply constant pressure and maintain a strong board presence. Overall, this deck aims to overwhelm opponents with its aggressive playstyle and efficient creature synergies.
